insert into T_SIGN_DATE
ARCHIVE_ID,
T_DATE,

mapper.update:
update T_SIGN_DATE
ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
T_DATE = #{tDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
T_GET_TIME = #{tGetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
T_GET_STATU = #{tGetStatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T_SIGN_DAY = #{tSignDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T_PRIZE_MONEY = #{tPrizeMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where T_DATE_ID = #{tDateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update T_SIGN_DATE set ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, T_DATE = #{tDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, T_GET_TIME = #{tGetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, T_GET_STATU = #{tGetStatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T_SIGN_DAY = #{tSignDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T_PRIZE_MONEY = #{tPrizeMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where T_DATE_ID = #{tDateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
